name: [TBD]
description:
This game is a continuation of my Ludum Dare 40 Game Jam submission.

In the LD40 game, you play a wanted criminal on the run from the police. The twist is that in order to gain score, you need to stay within the gun sights of the police as much as possible while evading bullets.

For this new version, I'm shifting the setting to a cyberpunk universe based on my long term game project. The story is currently being developed along with new gameplay and a presentation overhaul.

DEVELOPMENT

Unity game engine, Modo, Audacity

Check the Development Logs below for the latest updates.
